pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū dirattatirattaṁ senāya vasamānā uyyodhikampi balaggampi senābyūhampi anīkadassanampi gacchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.3_0: Aññataropi chabbaggiyo bhikkhu uyyodhikaṁ gantvā kaṇḍena paṭividdho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.5_0: “kacci, bhante, suyuddhaṁ ahosi, kati te lakkhāni laddhānī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.6_0: So bhikkhu tehi manussehi uppaṇḍiyamāno maṅku ahosi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.8_0: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya āgacchissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.9_2: ye mayaṁ ājīvassa hetu puttadārassa kāraṇā uyyodhikaṁ āgacchāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.10_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhū tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.11_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.12_0: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchissantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.13_0: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchathā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.16_0: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, uyyodhikaṁ dassanāya gacchissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.18_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:1.19.1_0: “Dirattatirattañce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṁ vā balaggaṁ vā senābyūhaṁ vā anīkadassanaṁ vā gaccheyya,
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.6_0: ettakā hatthī, ettakā assā, ettakā rathā, ettakā pattī.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.8_0: ito hatthī hontu, ito assā hontu, ito rathā hontu, ito pattikā hontu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.11_3: cattāro purisā sarahatthā pattī pacchimaṁ pattānīkaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.14_0: Dassanūpacāraṁ vijahitvā punappunaṁ passati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.1.17_0: Dassanūpacāraṁ vijahitvā punappunaṁ passati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc50:2.2.3_0: bhikkhussa ṭhitokāsaṁ vā nisinnokāsaṁ vā nipannokāsaṁ vā āgantvā sampahāro dissati,
